body.name: HOSTACK 5 Drawer Dresser with Door, Storage Cabinet with Drawers and Shelves, Wide Wood Dresser, Modern Chest of Drawers Organizers for Living Room, Kitchen, Hallway (Ash Grey, 1 PC)
features: 【5-Drawer Dresser with Door】Boasting 5 equal-sized pull-out drawers as well as a 2-shelves cabinet with door, this white dresser offers ample space to store towels, beauty, skin care, magazines and books, etc. And its spacious tabletop works perfectly to display photos, bouquets, lamps and more

【Multi-Purpose】This modern dresser with door is a versatile pick that can be ready to tuck neatly as a storage dresser, a coffee bar, a kitchen sideboard or a storage console table in your kitchen, living room, entryway or dining room. What's more, it can perfectly maximize your storage and create a coordinated look by placing alone or in a pair

【Chic Modern Style】Marring classic white color with rustic wooden flair, the storage cabinet with drawers perfectly embodies both elegant modern style and farmhouse taste, which adds a touch of beauty and modernity. A tastefully clean look makes it even easier to blend seamlessly with any color schemes and tones for a cozy and retro vibe

【Worry-free Structure】Constructed of high-quality engineered wood and premium smooth-gliding metal slides, the the chests of drawer boasts excellent stability and durability. Furthermore, the top board can holds up to 275 lbs, each drawer for 55 lbs. Overall size: 15.7"D x 31.5"W x 38.42"H

【Easy Assembly】Hassle-Free Assembly is allowed with straightforward instructions and labled pieces, normally you can finish the wide organizer and storage within 1 hour. Your satisfaction is continuely the goal we're fighting for, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about purchase and product

What should I do if there are missing or damaged parts? Please confirm the numbers or letters of this parts according to the instruction, with which we can exactly resend the pieces you need What should I do if I don't find the instruction in the package? Please be easy, we can send you a digital instruction in PDF What should I do if the doors can't close well or are closed with uneven gaps？ Don't worry, the door gaps could be adjusted through the screws of the hings, you can find detailed guidance in the manual. And if you need, we could provide further assistance What should I do if the drawers get stucked and can't be rightly closed? We advice to check whether the drawer sildes are installed with the right holes for the first, it should be done exactly as the same in the manual. And if you need, we could provide further assistance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the drawer/cabinet! Contrasting color features is very attractive. Sturdy. Was bit difficult to put together. Did it by myself. Time-consuming, but very doable. One drawer rod had a broken wheel. Hardware store had rod replacements for very cheap - so not an unfixable issue, and I’m sure a rare fluke. Really attractive, yet low profile piece of furniture .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Great storage for my craft room. Very sturdy. Very clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional and well designed
reviews.reviewText: The cabinet is well designed and instructions complete and simple to follow. There are a lot of parts and takes some time to assemble. Mine arrived with apparent package damage and appeared to be re-packaged. I took photos for the seller who assured me they do not resell damaged items or those missing parts to other clients.It’s sturdy and functional. This would work well for kitchen or bathroom to hold linens and stored products. The hardware makes this cabinet design above cheap assembly furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: putting the rails on the drawers were a little confusing, but once we got it, it was easy. Very sturdy and attractive piece of furniture. Well worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice piece of furniture
reviews.reviewText: This took some time to assemble, but it looks beautiful and is very sturdy. We are very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's ok for the money.
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice enough piece of furniture. I was disappointed in the color. I was hoping for more grey instead of the barnwood brown. There is a slight grey tinge but it's mostly brownish.Not hard to put together but is very time consuming. It works for what I want to store in it but would not purchase again due to the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: good looking. looks fancy and modern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars We like it.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a little smaller than we thought it would be. But it’s sturdy, easy to assemble and not a bad price.
